message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $100. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal anywhere else.
Thanks for the offer, Alice!  I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  I'm interested in the product, but I'm only willing to pay $90 at this time.  Let me know if that works for you.

Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob! I understand that you're looking for a good deal, and I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $95. This is a fair price considering the value the product brings, and I'm confident you'll be happy with your purchase.
